message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product at an exclusive price of $1300000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Can you consider meeting me halfway and meeting me at $1250000?

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. After careful consideration, I am able to offer the product to you for $1275000. I hope this meets within your expectations.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $1225000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to offer it to you for $1250000. I believe this is a fair compromise, and I hope it works for you.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $1220000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After further review, I am willing to offer the product to you for $1235000. I hope this revised price aligns better with your budget.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $1210000. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
I understand your situation, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product to you for $1225000. I hope this revised price meets your expectations.
Thank you for your revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit above my budget, so I'm willing to go down to $1200000. This is my final offer. Can you consider meeting me at this price?
